attributes.action: keep the constituant conteries of England, Scotland, Nothern Ireland and Whales remian united as one for ages eternal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We; the people of Great Britian, Northern Ireland and the British dominions beyond the seas; demand that the constituant conteries of England, Scotland, Nothern Ireland and Whales remian united as one for ages eternal.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/300Years/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
